title: I cant play lol
body:
I have league on mac. Everything works fine, except when the game starts and opens up, I get a black screen. Instead of seeing those cards, I see a black screen. I can wait in q and make a draft pick. But when the actual game opens up, black screen. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the game several times and repaired the client, but i still see the black screen. I have waited an hour on this black screen, and nothing happens. I honestly dont know what to do. I think the origin of the problem is when i accidentally quit the client when I was loading into a game (Idk if i quit the client or the game itself). Anyways, I have OSX El Capitan. Let me know if u guys have any tips.

This also gave me leaverbuster so I want to figure this out

replies.body: It sounds like you're having a connection issue maintaining comms to the game server.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for troubleshooting steps to get this fixed up.  Make sure to select the Mac box for instructions specific to your issue.  Hopefully that will get you back in game and seeing clearly!
